div.head: C{Y}MBRO DILEDR{Y}{W} {Y}NERCHI ANNERCH at ei an{w}yl a‘i dhirgar bhrodur {y} Bonedhigion, Periglorion a‘r Pr{y}d{y}dhion o‘r genetl G{y}mbrou.
div.p:
P{Y} bei c{y}n ho{w}sed (bh' vrdhassa{w}l a‘m an{w}yl {w}lad{w}yr) dh{w}yn peth i berpheithr{w}ydh, ac {y}dy{w} gan la{w}eroedh bheio ar {y} peth a dharluni{w}yd {y}n dhiarab, er ihes a lh{w}ydhiant: ni b{y}sle c{y}meint mor rusaidh, na ch{y}nibher mor anih{y}bhasus ig{y}ch{w}n dechreuad; neu‘n h{y} trach i amcanu, a b{w}riadu g{w}neuthud {y} peth {y}r h{w}n nis gada{w}ei anniochgar{w}ch d{y}nion ei dh{w}yn i benn. Eithr gan bhod hynn {y}n {w}ybodedic i‘rhei c{y}d {w}ybodus; {y}nh{y}bhaml i‘r d{y}scedic; ac {y}n honneit i‘r neb ai {y}st{y}rrio {y}n dh{y}ledus; nas darbhu geni nebun idho ei hun, namyn {y}n h{y} trach i{w} {w}lad, i{w} bhro, i{w} genetl, i{w} rieni, a‘i garedigion (pe rhon a g{w}rthod o honynt ei gel{w}) mi amcenais {y}n g{y}ng{y} daidh, ac a r{y}bh{y}gais {y}n eha{w}n (poet anbhethlic bho‘r arbhaeth) gida' chennad, a na{w}dh pob h{y}ry{w} G{y}mro d{y}scedig (cyd {y} gelhassei erailh {y}n {w}elh) dorri‘r rhus, a rhodhi i la{w}r dhosparthiad ar vn o‘r saith gelbh{y} dhyda el{w}ir Rhetoreg, hon sy vn o la{w}bhor{w}ynnion g{w}ir dhoethineb, hon sy argl{w}ydhes a rheoledicbherch ar {w}eithredoedh olh {w}yr {y} byd. Ac o da{w} arnochi obhyn i mi beth y{w}‘r dhoethineb bhirein{w}a{w}r honn? Bid diau i{w}ch mai g{w}ybodaeth o Dhu{w} a dyn dr{w}y g{y}bhr{w}ydho {y}n
h{y}dha pob rhy{w} amsodh g{w}eithredoedh at ei dyben prioda{w}l. Achan i ni ‘{w}ybod, mai ‘r dhoethineb honn y{w} amcan b{w}riadus, a medh{w}l h{y} la{w}ch pob dyn athro{w}gar anch{w}ith {y}n {y} byd h{w}nn; na esceuluss{w}n ninnau neb ry{w}vn o‘r c{y}bhr{y}ghausydhi‘n ar{w}edhu, ac in t{y}{w}ys atti. Dr{w}y g{y}mmorth anhyludh {y} gelbh{y}dhyd {y}mma mae doethineb {y}n {y}mdhangos {y}n ei glendid; {y}nd{y} scleirio {y}n eisplennydh oleuni; {y}n honni ei dibhethl bho{w}redh; {y}n datcan ei nerth anh{y}bhigh; ac bhegys ph{y}nnon ammhalhnant, {y}nt{y}{w} alht n{w}ydau‘r gallon; neu {y}ntau bhegys steren {y}n argan pob dirgel{w}ch, i‘n g{w}neuthud {y}n g{y} dnab{y} dhus. Ac am nad oes i‘{w}ybodaeth d{y}na{w}l ond dau ran arbennic; sebh {y}n g{y}ntabh gohanred rh{w}gh {y}nailh betha‘r ihalh, {y}n nessa {y}madrodh phraeth, adhurna{w}l: Rhaid y{w}ch {w}ybod mae o‘r g{y}ntabh {y} t{y}bhodh {y} gelbh{y}dhyd a el{w}ir Amres{y}mmeg ac mai o‘r ail {y} tardhodh ac {y} blagurodh Phraethineb. {Y} g{y}ntabh iadh{y}scu‘n h{y}{w}ir, iathra{w}u ‘n h{y}dhœth, i‘mr{y}ss{y}mmu ‘n anh{y}som. {Y}r aili amli{w}io {y}madrodh {y}n bherthus, i amry{w}ioli araith {y}nh{y}bhygr; i dhodrebhnu {y}mdhidhanion m{w}ynbhoes a phob rhy{w} {w}{y}chder c{y}meredic. Gann h{y}nny obhedru dosbennu anian pob peth ({y} gan m{w}yabh;) obheddru terbh{y}nu naturiolaeth pethau elbhennol {y}n adr{y}bedhus; obhedru gohanredu ‘n dhidolaidh; o bhedru dosrannu ‘ng{y}{w}reint; a barnu ‘n h{y}bhra{w}d: {y} g{w}yb{y}dhir bhod dyn {y}n greadur rhes{y}m ma{w}l. Obhedru mdhidhan {y}n araithia{w}l, sharad {y}n barabldhoeth, {y}mch{w}edleua ‘n bhodhhaus o dhigorni delbhr{y} dau {y}r enaid; o dhibl{y}gu medh{y}lsiau‘r gallon ar e‘iriau g{w}edhol, h{y}goel, h{y}bhedr, a h{y}bhr{y}d; {y}r adneb{y}hir bhod dyn {y}n greadur e{y} bheilhad{w}y. Her{w}ydh h{y}nny er m{w}yn galhu o dhyn adrodh {y}n drebhnus ei amcanion, a‘i{w}{y}lh{y}sbhryd, vrdho naturiaeth a cruc{y} gelbh{y}dhyd honn; gan rodhi i ni athr{y}llith ‘alhuog i bhedru gosod,
a s{y}nn{w}yr i g{y}mharu geiriau rh{w}ydh a bra{w}dhegau rhagora{w}l, ig{y}mmynu, ac i adeilad {y} gelbh{y}dhyd hon, i{w} harbher {y}n dhirlon, a‘inotay {y}n aghhenrhaid er lhes{w}edh c{y} dieith{y} dhion, ac er ma{w}li dhu{w} by{w}. Arh{y}nny, mal {y}mae Amres{y}mmeg {y}n rh{w}y dho vni‘mr{y}s{y}mmu ac i {w}neuthur g{w}ahā rh{w}gh g{w}irionedh a'chel{w}ydh; nid my{w}n vn gelbh{y}dhyd: eithr {y}m mhob g{w}ybodaeth, a ch{y}{w}reinr{w}ydh: {Y}r vn sut {y} mae phraethineb {y}n d{y}scu phraethebu, ac araitho {y}n hyodl m{y}{w}n Du{w}indeb, medhiginiaeth, c{y}bhreith{w}riaeth, mil{w}riaeth, ac {y}m mhob c{y}tro {y}m mhlith d{y}nion. Canys p{w}y a dhichyn dhealh {y}r scruthur lan, honn y{w} {y}mborth {y}r enaid, heb {w}ybodaeth o‘r‘gelbh{y}dhyd {y}ma? P{w}y a bhedr dhealh scribhenn{y} dhion tiriondhyse, neu storia{w}yr h{y} dalm, hebg{y} dnabod a throelhau {y} madrodh? P{w}y a g{y}mmer arno ch{w}ilio‘n l{w}ydhiannus {y}r Arabieit, a‘r Gry{w}ieit ph{y}s{y}g{w}yr, heb {y} gann{w}ylh {y}mma {y}n g{y}nritha{w}l o‘i blaen? P{w}y vn sy‘n dealh {y}r iaith sathredic {w}erina{w}g (nim da{w}r pavn {y}n {y}r olh bhyd) hebg{y}mmorth {y} gelbh{y}dhyd hon? Diau nebū Nid vn iaith sy‘n gnotay, ac {y}n benth{y}ccio ech{w}ynborth gan honn: anid pob iaith (mal {y} d{y}ch{w}einia) sy‘n eiriol arni am adhbh{w}yndeb, rhac tr{w}scl annhrebhn, ac ammorth. {Y}n Hebraec bho dh{y}{w}edir,

Nid agheu sy ‘las; eithr {y} dyn alas: ac er h{y}nny mae ‘n {w}iriaith s{y} n{w}yr {y}madrodh. {Y}n Phraghæc, Nul n‘ est tresmechant tout a coup, ains par degres, & peu a peu. nid ar vn d{y}r nod (sebh ar vn{w}aith) {y} d{y} ch{w}el dyn {y}n {w}aetha: eithr mesur {y} ch{y} dig ac {y} ch{y} dig. {Y}n Italæc, Tutte le arme del venetia no armerion le paura. Ni dhichyn holh arbhae G{w}enethia arbhogaethu obhn, sebh {y} rhei obhnus. {Y}n Hispanæc, Cuentas de beato y vnas de Garanato. Padreuaug{w}yr du{w}iol, a chrabhaghau cig{w}ennol. A‘r vn phunyd my{w}n ieithoedh erailh. Her{w}ydh paham ch{w}i{w}el{w}ch mor aghenraid y{w} d{y}seu, a medru ‘r gelbh{y}dhyd {w}ma, idhealh erailh; i adrodhi {y}n dhealhus; ac i‘m{w}rthod a phob {y}madrodh anhyodl, s{y} myl, {w}rth {y} marbher ar troelhau, a‘r phygurau; {y} rhei bhal ser, neu bhain g{w}erthbha{w}r a‘{w}nant ag{w}edh pob {y}madrodh{y}n dhisclair. Ac o blegyd h{y}nny {y} d{y}{w}edau Pyrr bhrenin ardher cha{w}g, a mil{w}r gorchestol, {y} nnilh o hono m{w}y o dyrnasoedh dr{w}y hyodlr{w}ydh, a phraethineb Cineas; nag a ennihassei a‘i bh{y} dhinoedh ci{w}da{w}dol. {Y}n dhiau, my{w}n rh{y}bhel ac erlid, nid oes dim mor dhidhanus i‘r mil{w}yr, a‘r ci{w}da{w}d{w}yr, a derchabhu {y} madrodhi gymmelh obhn i dharost{w}gh. M{y} bhi a eglureis bob troelh {y}madrodh, a phygr ar eghraphoedh or scruthur lan er m{w}yn c{y}bheithrin g{w}ir grebhybh gristnoga{w}l; ag o‘r pr{y} d{y} dhion a‘r beirdh C{y}mreig, er ma{w}l bardhoinaeth a{w} en{y} dha{w}l. {Y}r hynn boen ag{y}merais ar dhamuniad {y} pendebhig vrdhassol, Ioan Salusburi aer Lhe{w}eni, i‘r h{w}nn {y}dh{w}yd ti iaith g{y}mraec {y}n rh{w}ymedig i{w} garu, a‘i bha{w}rhau‘n g{y} bhadhas, am ei obhal{w}ch am danat‘, a‘i dhiphuantr{w}ydh tuagattat. Y dh{y}{w}edhu, ch{w}ch{w}i bhonedhigion Periglorion, vchel{w}yr Pr{y}d{y} dhion, ac erailh, adol{w}yn {y} dh{w}ybh er m{w}yn cobhad{w}riaeth henabhieit, er m{w}yn p{w}ylhedh g{w}ybodaeth er m{w}yn ma{w}l eich rhieni, er m{w}yn ceid {w}ad g{w}roliaeth, er m{w}yn
braint {y} Br{y}tannieit, er m{w}yn diorsedh an{w}yb{y} dhiaeth, er g{w}arth i‘r gel{y}nnion, ac er m{w}yn Du{w}; cannorth{w}y{w}ch, jaith {y} C{y}mbru, tr{w}ssi{w}ch, a di{w}elh{w}ch, {y}ng{y}stal dr{w}y i ch{w}i ‘obr{w}yo g{w}yr d{y}scedic, i{w} chasclu ‘n lh{w}yr rhac dileith aniala{w}g; ei ch{y}nnal {y}n le{w}, dr{w}y obhal anhep{w}edh; a‘ihardhu ‘n bholiannus, a phob c{y}bhr{w}ydhyd gorbhubhia{w}c. Ac hebhyd dr{w}y i ch{w}i (bhonedhion) scribhennu {y}ndhi {y} nailh at {y} lalh. Can{y}s o dhiphyc h{y} nny {y}r {y}dych (gan m{w}yabh mor an{w}ybodus {y} ndhi, a hithau mor anh{y}bhedr i ch{w}i; mal na‘s gelh{w}chi ei chlodbhori‘n ia{w}n, na hithau ch{w}aith nemor o ‘{w}asanaeth ich{w}i. A hen phych y{w}ch {y}n {y} byd {y} ma; ac {y}n {y}r vchelnebh, lha{w}enydh didraghca‘ch gordhi{w}edho.
